definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb

pinyin: fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 bei4 xin1
fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 zhuang1 zhi4

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒並決定減少壓力和調整飲食，改變現狀。

sentences.english: Adjust the density (amount of ink) of the print.
sentences.chinese: 調整打印時墨點的密度。

sentences.english: The dosages of two drugs were adjusted according to blood pressure change.
sentences.chinese: 根據血壓控制情況調整兩組的降壓藥劑量。

sentences.english: The distance of the braiding product is not adjustable. If necessary, the gear to be replaced shall be adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 編帶產品間距不可調，如果需要調整要更換齒輪。

sentences.english: Allthe rails width adjustment are quickly, easily accessible accessible acrossible across the entire width of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 在調幅範圍內，迅速靈活調整全機軌道寬窄。

sentences.english: Significant micro- and macro-adjustments are in the works.
sentences.chinese: 微觀面和宏觀面的重大調整仍在進行之中。

sentences.english: If flexibility isn’t your strong suit, simply bend your knees to adjust.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的軀體不夠靈活，可以彎曲膝部來調整一下。

sentences.english: Bull Market Correcting or Bear Returning?
sentences.chinese: 此際是牛市調整或是熊市回頭？

sentences.english: My friend said he could always arrange his schedule around your schedule.
sentences.chinese: 我朋友說他可以根據你的課程表來調整他上課的時間。

sentences.english: The knurled knob (GG) at the bottom end of the depth adjustment rod can be used to make minor adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 用深度調節杆底端的滾花柱頭可以做細小調整。

sentences.english: You can adjust for that by using made-up conversion rates known as Purchasing Power Parities , or PPPs.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用取得的轉換率，即購買力平價對其進行調整。

sentences.english: Enterprise's outside migration is one of the results of industry structure adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 企業外遷是經濟發展過程中產業結構調整的微觀顯現。

sentences.english: Politically there were the tax reform and adjustment of the lower administration systems.
sentences.chinese: 政治方面體現在賦役的改革和基層管理體系的調整。

sentences.english: Resizable Main window and some other cosmetic changes.
sentences.chinese: 可調整大小的主要窗口和其他一些表面的改變。

sentences.english: Players can also fine-tune their characters' clothing, size and expressions.
sentences.chinese: 玩家也能自由調整他們角色的服飾，體型和外表。

definition: whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
